org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.trigger.sparql

Class AskQueryExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.trigger.sparql.AskQueryExample

  • public class AskQueryExample
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contains examples of ASK queries, which can be used to generate triggers or rather triggerConfig. They can be used complete or as pattern. All queries be based on SPARQL 1.1 Query Language.
    Author:
    agatting on 01.03.17.

      • QUERY_LAST_CONNECTION_PHASE_TIMESTAMP

        public static final java.lang.String QUERY_LAST_CONNECTION_PHASE_TIMESTAMP
        Sparql query to select the last timestamp of connection phase. The query considers the form of the last timestamp (normal literal or pointer across recentHeartBeat)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • exampleTrigger

        public void exampleTrigger()
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Just an example trigger. Do not use method. Take the example code and modify.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - Exception is thrown, if the TriggerFactory could not be buil.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception is thrown, if the application is interrupted.
